---
order: 2
title:
  zh-CN: 简洁卡片
  en-US: Simple card
---

## zh-CN

只包含内容区域。

## en-US

A simple card only containing a content area.

```jsx
import { Card } from 'antd';

ReactDOM.render(
  <Card style={{ width: 300 }}>
    <p>Card content</p>
    <p>Card content</p>
    <p>Card content</p>
  </Card>,
  mountNode,
);
```
